themes: pressure to conform to institutional norms
lack of inclusivity for diverse artists
authenticity versus acceptance in the arts
key_phrases: an artist is expected to be the opposite of thy authentic self
fit in to a system n order to be accepted
the ones that fit the systems get the opportunity
make systems that include all Artists
barriers_identified: pressure to conform to existing systems
exclusion of authentic or nonconforming artists
opportunities limited to those who fit the system
solutions_proposed: make systems that include all Artists
